main event: A civilian witness observed a strange football-shaped metallic craft in the sky for about 2 hours and 5 minutes on January 11, 1967 in Miles City, Ohio.
interesting points: The object alternated in color between white and red, looking like a bright star.
The object moved slowly and silently, the size of a jet aircraft.
The witness observed the object through an air camper, and it moved behind a cloud at one point.
The witness had not seen anything like this object before.
The witness reported the sighting to family and friends on February 2, 1967.
